MIN-SIK KIM

Hi, I'm a PostDoc in Earth and Planetory Science at University of California, Riverside, advised by Prof. Eric Barefoot.

Research Interests

Delta Morphodynamics Earth Surface Process

Research Projects

Explore my research projects in Earth Surface Processes, Morphodynamics, and Geomorphology.

  • Delta Morphodynamics and Restoration

    • 1. Effect of delta bottomset on deltaic land building

      Related Publication(s):

      • Kim, M., Kim, W., & Nahm, W-H. (2022). The effect of bottomset on fluviodeltaic land-building process: Numerical modelling and physical experiment. Basin Research, 34, 1763-780. (DOI: 10.1111/bre.12684)

        Google Scholar GitHub

    • 2. Enhanced mud retention and sustained delta growth

      Related Publication(s):

      • Kim, M., Chun, B., Chamberlain, E. and Kim, W. (2024). Enhanced mud retention as an autogenic mechanism for sustained delta growth: Insight from records of the Lafourche subdelta of the Mississippi River. Sedimentology. (DOI: 10.1111/sed.13230)

        Google Scholar GitHub

    • 3. Quantitative investigation on sediment retention fraction: Delft3D

  • Meandering River Dynamics

    • 1. Levee prevalence in backwater zones

      Related Publication(s):

      • Wu, C., Kim, M., & Kim, W. (2023). Natural levees increase in prevalence in the backwater zone: Coastal Trinity River, Texas, USA: COMMENT. Geology, 51(6), e564-e564.

        DOI

    • 2. Cutoff dynamics in meandering rivers

  • Exploratory projects

    • 1. Antropocence

      Related Publication(s):

      • Nahm, W., Kim, W., Kim, M., Park, BS., Han, M., Kim, S., Lim, HS., Choi,, J., Jun, C. (2024). The potential of Municipal Solid Waste (MSW) layers as Anthropocene strata. Episodes, 47, 179-186.

        DOI

    • 2. Rift basin filling model

      Related Publication(s):

      • Kim, W., Lee, J., Lee, Y., Kim, M., and Shin, H., 2024, A coupled model for rift basin evolution: Interactions of tectonics, sea-level cycle, and sediment network: Journal of Sedimentary Research (in review)

    • 3. Flocculation experiment

      Related Publication(s):

      • Kim, W., Kim, M., Zhou, C., Zhang, Z., Yuan, X., Zhang, J., Olariu, C., Steel, R., and Strom, K., 2024, Flocculation, Gravity flows, and Total Organic Carbon Hotspots: Journal of Sedimentary Research, (in review)

    • 2. River confluence delta's dynamic equilibrium

      Related Publication(s):

      • Kim, M., Shin, H., Nahm, W. H., & Kim, W. (2023). Dynamic Equilibrium Position Prediction Model for the Confluence Area of Nakdong River. Economic and Environmental Geology, 56(4), 435-445.

        DOI
